import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'] }) export class LoginComponent { email: string; // Declare the email property password: string; // Declare the password property constructor() { this.email = ''; } }

Login

Email is required and must be a valid email address.
Password is required.

Don't have an account? Sign up
